column1: #Text=Desna says : " Father , what are we doing here ? "
#Text=Unalaq says : " You 're here to straighten out the mess you caused when you failed to capture the Avatar . "
#Text=Desna says : " I told you , it was n't our fault . "
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Good , because I 'll need your help to open the northern portal .
#Text=" Desna says : " I thought only the Avatar could do it .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " I believe there is another way .
